q.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
q.author: Albert Schweitzer

q.quote: A discovery is said to be an accident meeting a prepared mind.
q.author: Albert Szent-Gyorgyi

q.quote: I feel about romance the same way I do about a vocation; it's a calling.
q.author: Alden Ehrenreich

q.quote: After silence, that which comes nearest to expressing the inexpressible is music.
q.author: Aldous Huxley

q.quote: I just love rome. It really does cast a spell on you.
q.author: Alec Baldwin

q.quote: The people who have really made history are the martyrs
q.author: Aleister Crowley

q.quote: Fear of the unknown is a great creative partner.
q.author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

q.quote: People say I am mad. I am not mad. I am trying to heal my soul.
q.author: Alejandro Jodorowsky

q.quote: True beauty is born through our actions and aspirations and in the kindness we offer to others
q.author: Alek Wek

q.quote: It wasn't poverty that drove me on.
q.author: Aleksandr Kuprin

q.quote: Violence can only be concealed by a lie, and the lie only be maintained by violence.
q.author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn

q.quote: I keep my hair curly and natural beacause I really just wanna show who I am.
q.author: Alessia Cara

q.quote: I believe in God and immortality
q.author: Alex Campbell

q.quote: I've never played for a draw in my life.
q.author: Alex Ferguson

q.quote: Not everything happens for a reason. Sometimes life just sucks.
q.author: Alexa Chung
